name: Grumpy Grandpa
description:
Hmpf..

 Help pine tree loving Karl Heinz destroy all the beautiful gardens of his annoying neighbours. They take away all the attention of his beloved pines in the town "Tannburg"...

 No matter how old you are, the good old times were better...all these young spoiled people... Try to destroy as much of the gardens as possible, you don't 

have all time in the world.


                    Points:                      Time:

Sprout:           10                               0

Flower:           25                               0

Sunflower:     50                               0

Cactus:        -25                            +15

Gnome:          70                            -25

Move: W,A,S,D / Left Stick

Interact: E / Left Button

1. Download ZIP-Foulder

2. Save the ZIP-foulder in a safe space

3. Right click and select "extract here"

4. Start the .exe file

5. Have fun

Concept art / Lead Artist:                                            Finn

Lead programmer / Level Designer / Sounds:            Kaja
